column1: Smoque BBQ////There's usually a long line at this place
column2: but we got lucky and the wait time wasn't any longer than 10 minutes to get our food and seated. I know this is a barbecue joint
column3: but my favorite thing on their menu is not their ribs
column6: - it's their macaroni and cheese! They are so good
column7: they were my two sides with the order. The ribs were good
column8: just a bit on the dry side for me. Briskets were good also. I didn't like the sauces that came with the ribs
column9: so I used Tabasco sauce instead.
